actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

official_title: A bill to amend the Saccharin Study and Labeling Act to extend the moratorium on the authority of the Secretary of Health and Human Services with respect to saccharin to May 1, 1990.

summary.text: Amends the Saccharin Study and Labeling Act to extend to May 1, 1990, the period during which the Secretary of Health and Human Services may not take certain actions to restrict the continued use of saccharin or of any food, drug, or cosmetic containing saccharin.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Saccharin Study and Labeling Act to extend the moratorium on the authority of the Secretary of Health and Human Services with respect to saccharin to May 1, 1990.
